channel.title: Getting my server online!
channel.description: Ok so i have a source, got java jdk, able to get on my server, made my self admin, BUT I can only play by myself! I gave my client to my friend but he cant get on? How do i "put" the no-ip to my client? ANd if i do will the client connect to my source? It says its conecting to 127.0.0.1.. thats not my no-ip address thingy! How do I change that so the client connects to my source so i can get it online for my friends!!! :mad: Oh and I also portforward it to 43594 by opening the port in utorrent and in my router... PLus i added to the exceptions list in my firewall settings. Is that right?

item.title: Getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @Coolguy77 Coolguy77
item.description:
@Coolguy77 wrote:

Can someone check my server please?

item.description:
@Coolguy77 wrote:

oh k im forgetful btw -.- if i dont reply by 3:00 PST yh email me -.-

EDIT:
WAIT DIDNT I PORTFORWARD IT??
http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Netgear/WNR1000v2/Runescape_Private_Server.htm
thats how my rotuer exactly looks like i followed every step… ALso I added it to my exception on the firewall settings o and put the port on my utorrent… Is thta all too unnecessary?

item.title: Getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @rang3_pkz rang3 pkz
item.description:
@rang3_pkz wrote:

Yeah and btw I meant “Kids” not lids sorry for typo. So have the kids download the one with the no-ips. Then have a client with all 127.0.0.1 for you… If you port forwarded it’ll work. If you didn’t port forward properly I’ll help you tomorrow with that

EDIT: O I GET IT! I need to have a copy having no-ips and a copy with 127 for me lololololol

item.title: Getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @rang3_pkz rang3 pkz
item.description:
@rang3_pkz wrote:

You need to have a client with all the no-ips. Then upload that and get lids to download then play. Then you can change your client back to 127.0.0.1 and it’ll connect for you

Read full topic

[quote=“Coolguy77, post:15, topic:380694”]ok i got rid of anything that says 127.0.0.1 and then compiled it my friends offline again but when i connect to myself it wont run so im guessing its not working. O and when i compile it says
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API:
Note: Recompile with -Xlint: deprecation for details.
Finished!
Is that normal??[/quote]

Yes.

Have you portforwarded?

item.title: Getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @rang3_pkz rang3 pkz
item.description:
@rang3_pkz wrote:

Coolguy I’m going to put this into steps:

  1. Search for 127.0.0.1
  2. Change 127.0.0.1 to your no-ip
  3. Upload your client and see if a friend of yours can connect.

item.title: Getting my server online!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

public client() { 
fullscreenInterfaceID = -1; 
chatRights = new int[500]; 
chatTypeView = 0; 
clanChatMode = 0; 
cButtonHPos = -1; 
cButtonHCPos = -1; 
cButtonCPos = 0; 
//server = "theparadiseowns.no-ip.biz"; 
//server = "runedynasty.no-ip.org"; 
//server = "75.74.246.66"; 
server = "0.0.0.0";

Thats in your client class.
